projectContext.vision: To modernize our banking operations and enhance customer experience through digital transformation

stages.name: Initiation
stages.objective: Establish project foundations, governance, and key success criteria to align stakeholders and secure approval.
deliverables: Initial stakeholder register and engagement plan
High-level business case and benefits outline
activities: Identify and confirm sponsor and key stakeholders Stakeholder, Stakeholder, Stakeholder
Define project objectives, scope boundaries, and success criteria
Develop initial risk and issue management approach
Create high-level benefits map and value case
Prepare and present initiation review for approval
assessmentCriteria: Initial risk register populated with top risks
High-level business case validated by sponsors

stages.name: Delivery Stage 1
stages.objective: Deliver core digital banking capabilities and establish foundational architecture for customer experience improvements.
deliverables: Initial integration with core banking system and API layer
activities: Refine requirements with Senior User and [BUSINESS_ANALYST_1]
Design and approve target architecture and data flows
Develop and test core digital capabilities (e.g., online account access, secure messaging)
Set up CI/CD pipelines and deployment environment
Conduct user acceptance testing with representative users
assessmentCriteria: Core features demonstrated in a controlled environment
Interfaces with external systems defined and prototyped
UAT results acceptable with stakeholder sign-off

stages.name: Delivery Stage 2
stages.objective: Expand functionality, optimize performance, and begin broader rollout and customer enrichment features.
deliverables: Expanded feature set including self-service enhancements
Pilot rollout plan and operating model
activities: Advance features with Senior User validation and sign-off
Performance testing and tuning of critical paths
Data quality and migration validation activities
Security controls review and penetration testing
Stakeholder training and change readiness activities
assessmentCriteria: Pilot rollout plan tested and feasible
Change readiness validated across key user groups

stages.name: Closure
stages.objective: Finalize project, capture lessons, handover to operations, and confirm benefits realization plan.
deliverables: Project closure report with lessons learned
Benefits realization plan and post-implementation reviews
activities: Finalize all remaining deliverables and sign-offs
Document lessons learned and archive artifacts
Transition support to operations and training materials
Conduct benefits review and sign-off
Close project governance and release resources
assessmentCriteria: Operations ready to support new capabilities
Benefits realization plan approved and owned

criticalPathActivities: Core feature development and integration with core banking
UAT and sign-off for Stage 1 and Stage 2
keyDependencies: Approval of Business Case by Steering Committee
Availability of Senior User for requirements validation
Access to core banking system for integration
qualityCheckpoints: Requirements quality checkpoint: backlog clarity and acceptance criteria defined
Architecture and design review gates before development
Code quality and security review at every sprint boundary
Testing readiness and test coverage validation
Deployment readiness and rollback plan validation

ganttChart.dependenciesNotes: Sequence follows project stages with Stage 1 deliverables enabling Stage 2 initiation. External system access and security approvals are critical path blockers.

assumptions: Key stakeholders Stakeholder, Stakeholder, Stakeholder remain available for workshops
Core banking system interfaces are available for Stage 1 integration
Budget approved with contingency for ±15% cost tolerance
External vendors adhere to project schedule
Regulatory requirements remain stable during initiative
risks: Schedule slippage due to dependency on core system readiness
Scope creep from new regulatory requirements
Resource availability fluctuations for critical roles

suggestions: Validate stage gates with governance board
Confirm resource availability for each stage
